content: this is a free crochet tutorial with video for the a poinsettia flower language english us level of difficulty advanced beginner terms of use | copyright all pictures and the pattern contained in this document are the property of zamiguz handmade creations by magna haskell aka maggie this pattern is for personal use only it is prohibited to copy share resell translate publish alter distribute or reproduce the pattern or parts of it in any form online or offline you may sell your handmade items made from my patterns and i would appreciate if you gave credits to zamiguz handmade creations @zamiguz no mass production allowed
